EmailTemplate.subject: Declined 7-Eleven application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for your recent application for a 7-Eleven Fuel Card Account.
After careful consideration of the details you have provided and an assessment of your overall circumstances, unfortunately we are unable to provide you with a credit facility on this occasion.
Yours sincerely,
Rick Rose John Petit Managing Director Head of Fuel WEX Australia 7-Eleven Stores Pty Ltd
